title: Checking expected species and contamination in bacterial isolate
questions: What are the species in bacterial isolate sequencing data?
objectives: Run a series of tool to identify species in bacterial isolate sequencing data
key_points: Bracken extracts species from Kraken assignations
Recentrifuge extracts stats and creates visualization from Kraken report

admin_install_yaml:
---
install_tool_dependencies: true
install_repository_dependencies: true
install_resolver_dependencies: true
tools:
- name: bracken
  owner: iuc
